description: Succelent turkey breast with a delicious herby taste.
keywords: Roast turkey,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Herb Roasted Turkey Breast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium turkey breasts, butterfly cut, skin still on

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Combine all the seasoning with the butter. Now divide the butter mix into 8.
Put 1 herbed butter piece inside the turkey breast and the second just under the skin on top.

Place the breasts in a baking dish and roast in the oven for 30 minutes or until cooked fully. You can re-baste with the juices halfway through. Remove from the oven and suggested serving with mash or roast potatoes.
